Since FF is now embracing the tab bar even more, which I find good and I want to use, I see it clashing with software which adds additional buttons to the window decoration.

In my case I'm using the NVidia driver to add a button for "Move window to next monitor" which now overlays with the tab bar.

Reproducible: Always

Created attachment 506370
Windows 7 window decoration overlapping tab bar

In my case I've also the "With open" extension which also uses the space and whose IE icon is behind the new button, I think because the tab bar thinks it can use the whole space when it shouldn't.

Even when not using "With open" extension to show the other browser button, things are overlapping (i.e. Panorama).
